meanings.definition: Not charged for services rendered or goods supplied.
meanings.sent1: The unbilled items were the ones we didn't have to pay for.
meanings.sent2: The company provided unbilled maintenance for our equipment.
meanings.sent3: It was a relief to see the unbilled amount on the receipt.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was like an unbilled gift that brightened my day.
meanings.sent5: The unbilled services felt like a pleasant surprise.

meanings.definition: Not yet recorded or accounted for in a financial statement.
meanings.sent1: The unbilled expenses will be included in next month's report.
meanings.sent2: The unbilled revenue is affecting our current financial status.
meanings.sent3: The unbilled numbers played hide and seek with the accountant.
meanings.sent4: Her potential profit was an unbilled treasure waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unbilled transactions lingered in the financial shadows.

meanings.definition: Not listed on a bill or invoice.
meanings.sent1: The unbilled items were accidentally left off the invoice.
meanings.sent2: We need to double-check for any unbilled charges before finalizing.
meanings.sent3: The unbilled items decided to play hide and seek with the bill.
meanings.sent4: Her unbilled purchases were like secrets waiting to be revealed.
meanings.sent5: The unbilled products seemed to dance around the billing system.
